mapper.insert:
INSERT into dpcoi_wo_order
dpcoi_wo_order_id,
dpcoi_order_id,
del_flag,
dpcoi_wo_order_type,
dpcoi_wo_order_state,
create_date,
confirm_date,
confirm_by,
delay_date,
#{dpcoiWoOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{dpcoiOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dpcoiWoOrderType,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{dpcoiWoOrderState,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{confirmDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{confirmBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{delayDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update dpcoi_wo_order
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dpcoi_wo_order_state = #{dpcoiWoOrderState,jdbcType=BIGINT},
confirm_date = #{confirmDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
file_complete_date = #{fileCompleteDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
manager_confirm_date = #{managerConfirmDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
confirm_by = #{confirmBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
file_complete_by = #{fileCompleteBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
manager_confirm_by = #{managerConfirmBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
delay_date = #{delayDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where dpcoi_wo_order_id = #{dpcoiWoOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` as dpcoiOrderId, dor.`ISSUED_NO` as issuedNo, dor.`DESIGN_CHANGE_NO` as designChangeNo, dor.`VEHICLE_NAME` as vehicleName, dor.`PRODUCT_NO` as productNo, dor.`HOPE_CUTTING_DATE` as hopeCuttingDate, dor.`REAL_CUTTING_DATE` as realCuttingDate, DATE_FORMAT(dor.`REAL_CUTTING_DATE`, '%Y-%m-%d') AS realCuttingDateStr, dor.`CHANGE_CONTENT` as changeContent, dor.`RELEASE_DATE` as releaseDate, dor.`RETURN_DATE` as returnDate, dor.`product_line` as productLine, DATE_FORMAT(dor.`RELEASE_DATE`, '%Y-%m-%d') AS releaseDateStr, DATE_FORMAT(dor.`RETURN_DATE`, '%Y-%m-%d') AS returnDateStr, dor.`DESIGN_ACT` as designAct, dor.`QUASI_ACT` as quasiAct, (SELECT users.`user_name` FROM sys_users users WHERE users.`USER_ID` = dor.`QUASI_ACT`) AS quasiActName, dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_STATE` as dpcoiOrderState, dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_TYPE` as dpcoiOrderType, dor.`TASK_ORDER_ID` AS taskOrderId, (SELECT info.`task_info_value` FROM task_order_info info WHERE info.`TASK_TYPE_INFO_ID` = '1' AND info.`ORDER_ID` = dor.`TASK_ORDER_ID`) AS taskOrderNo, dor.`REMARK` as remark, wo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` as dpcoiWoOrderId, wo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_STATE` as dpcoiWoOrderState, wo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE` as dpcoiWoOrderType from dpcoi_order dor, dpcoi_wo_order wo, dpcoi_role_state rs, dpcoi_user_role ur, dpcoi_user du
dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` = wo.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` and wo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_STATE` = rs.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_STATE` and wo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE` = rs.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE` and rs.`DPCOI_ROLE_ID` = ur.`DPCOI_ROLE_ID` and ur.`DPCOI_USER_ID` = du.`DPCOI_USER_ID` and dor.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' and wo.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' and ur.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' and du.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' and du.`DPCOI_USER_STATE` = '1' and rs.state_type = 1 and dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_TYPE` in (1, 2)
and dor.`VEHICLE_NAME` like CONCAT('%',#{vehicleName},'%')
and dor.`PRODUCT_NO` like CONCAT('%',#{productNo},'%')
and dor.`HOPE_CUTTING_DATE` = #{hopeCuttingDate}
and DATE_FORMAT(dor.`REAL_CUTTING_DATE`,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{realCuttingDateStart,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dor.`REAL_CUTTING_DATE`,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{realCuttingDateEnd,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dor.`RELEASE_DATE`,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{releaseDateStart,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dor.`RELEASE_DATE`,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{releaseDateEnd,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d')
and du.`SYS_USER_ID` = #{dpcoiUserId}
AND dor.`product_line` like CONCAT('%',#{productLine},'%')
order by dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` desc limit #{start},#{size}

select count(1) from dpcoi_order dor, dpcoi_wo_order wo, dpcoi_role_state rs, dpcoi_user_role ur, dpcoi_user du
dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` = wo.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` and wo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_STATE` = rs.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_STATE` and wo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE` = rs.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE` and rs.`DPCOI_ROLE_ID` = ur.`DPCOI_ROLE_ID` and ur.`DPCOI_USER_ID` = du.`DPCOI_USER_ID` and dor.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' and wo.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' and ur.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' and du.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' and du.`DPCOI_USER_STATE` = '1' and rs.state_type = 1 and dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_TYPE` in (1, 2)
and dor.`VEHICLE_NAME` like CONCAT('%',#{vehicleName},'%')
and dor.`PRODUCT_NO` like CONCAT('%',#{productNo},'%')
and dor.`HOPE_CUTTING_DATE` = #{hopeCuttingDate}
and DATE_FORMAT(dor.`REAL_CUTTING_DATE`,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{realCuttingDateStart,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dor.`REAL_CUTTING_DATE`,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{realCuttingDateEnd,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dor.`RELEASE_DATE`,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{releaseDateStart,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(dor.`RELEASE_DATE`,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{releaseDateEnd,jdbcType=DATE},'%Y-%m-%d')
and du.`SYS_USER_ID` = #{dpcoiUserId}
AND dor.`product_line` like CONCAT('%',#{productLine},'%')

select dpcoi_wo_order_id, dpcoi_order_id, del_flag, dpcoi_wo_order_type, dpcoi_wo_order_state, create_date, confirm_date, file_complete_date, manager_confirm_date, confirm_by, file_complete_by, manager_confirm_by, delay_date from dpcoi_wo_order where dpcoi_wo_order_id = #{dpcoiWoOrderId}

select dpcoi_wo_order_id, dpcoi_order_id, del_flag, dpcoi_wo_order_type, dpcoi_wo_order_state, create_date, confirm_date, file_complete_date, manager_confirm_date, confirm_by, file_complete_by, manager_confirm_by from dpcoi_wo_order where dpcoi_order_id = #{dpcoiOrderId}

select group_concat(users.`EMAIL`) as email from dpcoi_role_state state, dpcoi_user_role role, dpcoi_user du, sys_users users where state.`DPCOI_ROLE_ID` = role.`DPCOI_ROLE_ID` and state.`STATE_TYPE` = '1' and role.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' and role.`DPCOI_USER_ID` = du.`DPCOI_USER_ID` and du.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' and du.`DPCOI_USER_STATE` = '1' and du.`SYS_USER_ID` = users.`USER_ID` and users.`DELETE_STATE` = '0' and state.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_STATE` = #{dpcoiWoOrderState} and state.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE` = #{dpcoiWoOrderType}

select group_concat(users.`EMAIL`) as email from dpcoi_wo_order wo, dpcoi_role_state state, dpcoi_user_role role, dpcoi_user du, sys_users users where wo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_STATE` = state.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_STATE` and wo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE` = state.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE` and state.`DPCOI_ROLE_ID` = role.`DPCOI_ROLE_ID` and role.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' and role.`DPCOI_USER_ID` = du.`DPCOI_USER_ID` and du.`DEL_FLAG` = '0' and du.`DPCOI_USER_STATE` = '1' and du.`SYS_USER_ID` = users.`USER_ID` and users.`DELETE_STATE` = '0' and wo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` = #{dpcoiWoOrderId}

SELECT dorder.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` AS dpcoiOrderId, dorder.rr_problem_id as rrProblemId, dorder.`ISSUED_NO` AS issuedNo, dorder.`DESIGN_CHANGE_NO` AS designChangeNo, dorder.`VEHICLE_NAME` AS vehicleName, dorder.`PRODUCT_NO` AS productNo, dorder.`HOPE_CUTTING_DATE` AS hopeCuttingDate, dorder.`REAL_CUTTING_DATE` AS realCuttingDate, DATE_FORMAT(dorder.`REAL_CUTTING_DATE`, '%Y-%m-%d') AS realCuttingDateStr, dorder.`CHANGE_CONTENT` AS changeContent, dorder.`RELEASE_DATE` AS releaseDate, dorder.`RETURN_DATE` AS returnDate, DATE_FORMAT(dorder.`RELEASE_DATE`, '%Y-%m-%d') AS releaseDateStr, DATE_FORMAT(dorder.`RETURN_DATE`, '%Y-%m-%d') AS returnDateStr, dorder.`DESIGN_ACT` AS designAct, dorder.`QUASI_ACT` AS quasiAct, (SELECT users.`user_name` FROM sys_users users WHERE users.`USER_ID` = dorder.`QUASI_ACT`) AS quasiActName, dorder.`DPCOI_ORDER_STATE` AS dpcoiOrderState, dorder.`DPCOI_ORDER_TYPE` AS dpcoiOrderType, dorder.`TASK_ORDER_ID` AS taskOrderId, (SELECT info.`task_info_value` FROM task_order_info info WHERE info.`TASK_TYPE_INFO_ID` = '1' AND info.`ORDER_ID` = dorder.`TASK_ORDER_ID`) AS taskOrderNo, woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` AS dpcoiWoOrderId, woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE` AS dpcoiWoOrderType FROM dpcoi_order dorder, dpcoi_wo_order woorder WHERE dorder.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` = woorder.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` AND woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` IN (SELECT woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` FROM dpcoi_order dorder, dpcoi_wo_order woorder WHERE dorder.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` = woorder.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` AND woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_STATE` = 1 AND woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE` = 1 AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_ADD(dorder.`pfmea_email_date`, INTERVAL 1 DAY)) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(SYSDATE()) UNION SELECT woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` FROM dpcoi_order dorder, dpcoi_wo_order woorder WHERE dorder.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` = woorder.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` AND woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_STATE` = 1 AND woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE` = 2 AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_ADD(dorder.`cp_email_date`, INTERVAL 1 DAY)) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(SYSDATE()) UNION SELECT woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` FROM dpcoi_order dorder, dpcoi_wo_order woorder WHERE dorder.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` = woorder.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` AND woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_STATE` = 1 AND woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE` = 3 AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_ADD(dorder.`standard_book_email_date`, INTERVAL 1 DAY)) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(SYSDATE()))

SELECT dorder.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` AS dpcoiOrderId, dorder.`ISSUED_NO` AS issuedNo, dorder.`DESIGN_CHANGE_NO` AS designChangeNo, dorder.`VEHICLE_NAME` AS vehicleName, dorder.`PRODUCT_NO` AS productNo, dorder.`HOPE_CUTTING_DATE` AS hopeCuttingDate, dorder.`REAL_CUTTING_DATE` AS realCuttingDate, DATE_FORMAT(dorder.`REAL_CUTTING_DATE`, '%Y-%m-%d') AS realCuttingDateStr, dorder.`CHANGE_CONTENT` AS changeContent, dorder.`RELEASE_DATE` AS releaseDate, DATE_FORMAT(dorder.`RELEASE_DATE`, '%Y-%m-%d') AS releaseDateStr, DATE_FORMAT(dorder.`RETURN_DATE`, '%Y-%m-%d') AS returnDateStr, dorder.`RETURN_DATE` AS returnDate, dorder.`DESIGN_ACT` AS designAct, dorder.`QUASI_ACT` AS quasiAct, (SELECT users.`user_name` FROM sys_users users WHERE users.`USER_ID` = dorder.`QUASI_ACT`) AS quasiActName, dorder.`DPCOI_ORDER_STATE` AS dpcoiOrderState, dorder.`DPCOI_ORDER_TYPE` AS dpcoiOrderType, dorder.`TASK_ORDER_ID` AS taskOrderId, (SELECT info.`task_info_value` FROM task_order_info info WHERE info.`TASK_TYPE_INFO_ID` = '1' AND info.`ORDER_ID` = dorder.`TASK_ORDER_ID`) AS taskOrderNo, woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` AS dpcoiWoOrderId, woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE` AS dpcoiWoOrderType FROM dpcoi_order dorder, dpcoi_wo_order woorder WHERE dorder.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` = woorder.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` AND woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` IN (SELECT woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` FROM dpcoi_order dorder, dpcoi_wo_order woorder WHERE dorder.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` = woorder.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` AND dorder.`pfmea_delay` = 0 AND woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_STATE` IN (2,3) AND woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE` = 1 AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(woorder.`delay_date`) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(SYSDATE()) UNION SELECT woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` FROM dpcoi_order dorder, dpcoi_wo_order woorder WHERE dorder.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` = woorder.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` AND dorder.`cp_delay` = 0 AND woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_STATE` IN (2,3) AND woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE` = 2 AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(woorder.`delay_date`) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(SYSDATE()) UNION SELECT woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` FROM dpcoi_order dorder, dpcoi_wo_order woorder WHERE dorder.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` = woorder.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` AND dorder.`standard_book_delay` = 0 AND woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_STATE` IN (2,3) AND woorder.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE` = 3 AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(woorder.`delay_date`) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(SYSDATE()))

SELECT two.`REPLY_USER` AS userId, info.`WO_INFO_VALUE` AS confrimResult FROM task_wo_order two, task_wo_order_sys_info info, dpcoi_order dor, dpcoi_wo_order dwo, sys_info sinfo WHERE two.`ORDER_ID` = dor.`TASK_ORDER_ID` AND two.`WO_ORDER_ID` = info.`WO_ORDER_ID` AND dor.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` = dwo.`DPCOI_ORDER_ID` AND info.`SYS_INFO_ID` = sinfo.`sys_info_id` AND sinfo.`dpcoi_flag` = dwo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_TYPE` AND dwo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_STATE` = 1 AND dwo.`DPCOI_WO_ORDER_ID` = #{dpcoiWoOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
SELECT count(1) FROM sys_holiday where DATE_FORMAT(holiday, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
